tasks.label: Build and Run AxeOS Dashboard
tasks.command: docker build -t axeos-dashboard:latest . && docker stop axeos-dashboard 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm axeos-dashboard 2>/dev/null || true && docker run -d --name axeos-dashboard -p 3000:3000 axeos-dashboard:latest

tasks.label: Run AxeOS Dashboard
tasks.command: docker stop axeos-dashboard 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm axeos-dashboard 2>/dev/null || true && docker run -d --name axeos-dashboard -p 3000:3000 axeos-dashboard:latest

tasks.label: Stop AxeOS Dashboard
tasks.command: docker stop axeos-dashboard && docker rm axeos-dashboard
